```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
qtod <- function(x) {
    x<-gsub("Y","",x)
    z<-strsplit("Q",x)
    yy<-sapply(x,function(x)x[1])
    qq<-sapply(x,function(x)x[2]) %>% as.numeric
    mm <- (qq-1)*3+1
    ymd(paste0(yy,"-",qq,"-01"))
    
}
dt <- dt %>% mutate(Date = qtod(Time)) 
```
